channel.title: CVE on KrakenD - Open source API Gateway
channel.description: Recent content in CVE on KrakenD - Open source API Gateway

item.title: CVE-2022-1561: Crafted backend urls
item.description: There is a new vulnerability in the Lura Project software (which is the KrakenD’s engine). We have immediately corrected the problem in the subsequent release after its report. Please upgrade to the latest version.
